|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 0 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = Elpida;B8064B2PB-8D-F; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->

|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;;;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, SDHC Card slot, |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->

|serial = yes,, DE-9,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = yes,, 14-pin header,, populated,, J8
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = HDMI 1.3, DVI-D, Audio In/Out (3.5mm), Bluetooth 2.1 EDR, |addchip = Flat-panel Display Digital Transmitter;Texas Instruments;TFP410PAP;;1;,,, 2-Bit BidirectionalVoltage-LevelTranslator;Texas Instruments;TXS0102DCUR;;1;,,, HDMI Companion Chip w/ Step-up DC-DC;Texas Instruments;TPD12S015A;;1;,,, Current Limited Power Distribution Switch;TI;TPS2054BD;;1;,,, USB 2.0 ULPI Transceiver;SMSC;USB3320;;1;,,, 400mA Low-Dropout Regulator;Texas Instruments;TPS73633;;1;,,, Fully Integrated Power Management;Texas Instruments;TWL6030;;1;,,, 4-Bit Bidirectional Voltage-Level Shifter;Texas Instruments;TXS0104E;;2;,,, SingleBuffer/DriverWith Open-DrainOutput;Texas Instruments;SN74LVC1G07;;1;,,, 20V Integrated Load Switch;Fairchild Semi;FDC6330L;;2;,,, Low-Capacitance 6-Channel ESD-Protection;Texas Instruments;TPD6E001;;2;,,, 8-Channel Audio Codec;Texas Instruments;TWL6040;;1;,,, Single Low Power Voltage Detector;Texas Instruments;TPS3803;;1;,,, USB Peripheral Power Management;Texas Instruments;TPS2141;;1;,,, 1.5A Low-Dropout Regulator;Texas Instruments;TL1963A;;1;,,, 3V RS232 Transceiver;Texas Instruments;MAX3232;;1;,,, 3-Channel ESD-Protection;Texas Instruments;TPD3E001;;1;,,, |802dot11_protocols = bgn

}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Texas Instruments]]'' OMAP 4430 @1GHz Dual Core ARM Cortex-A9 *RAM: 1GB DDR *Storage: SDHC Card Slot *GPU: PowerVR SGX540
